tuv.seg: HEAR admissions scheme for students from disadvantaged backgrounds
Scéim iontrála HEAR do mhic léinn a bhfuil cúlra faoi mhíbhuntáiste acu
The Higher Education Access Route (HEAR) is an admissions scheme for students from socially disadvantaged backgrounds
Is scéim iontrála atá sa Bhealach Rochtana ar Ardoideachas do mhic léinn a bhfuil cúlra faoi mhíbhuntáiste acu
The scheme aims to improve access to college for school-leavers from socio-economic backgrounds that are under-represented in third-level education
Díríonn an scéim ar rochtain a fheabhsú do lucht fágála scoile ó chúlraí socheacnamaíochta ar beag ionadaíochta atá acu in oideachas tríú leibhéal
Under the HEAR scheme a number of third-level places are allocated to school-leavers on a reduced points basis
Dáiltear roinnt áiteanna tríú leibhéal faoin scéim BRA bunaithe ar phointí laghdaithe do lucht fágála scoile a bhfuil cúlra faoi mhíbhuntáiste acu
To be eligible for the scheme you must meet certain indicators or criteria related to your financial, social and cultural circumstances – see ‘Indicators’ below
Chun a bheith incháilithe don scéim, caithfear critéir áirithe a chomhlíonadh i ndáil le cúinsí airgeadais, sóisialta, cultúrtha - féach ‘Táscairí’ thíos
How the scheme works
Conas a oibríonn an scéim
Each of the third-level colleges participating in the scheme has reserved a number of places on its courses for school-leavers who are eligible for HEAR
Tá roinnt áiteanna coinnithe ag gach coláiste tríú leibhéal atá rannpháirteach sa scéim do lucht fágála scoile atá incháilithe do BRA
You can find details of the places available through HEAR on the websites of the participating third-level colleges
Féadfaidh tú sonraí a fháil ar láithreáin ghréasáin na gcoláistí tríú leibhéal atá rannpháirteach
You apply for HEAR through the Central Applications Office (CAO) – see ‘How to apply’ below
Déantar iarratas ar BRA (HEAR) tríd an Lár-Ionad Iontrála (CAO) – féach ‘Conas iarratas a dhéanamh' thíos
Once you have been accepted as eligible for HEAR, you then compete for the reduced point places based on your Leaving Certificate results
Nuair a ghlactar leis go bhfuil tú incháilithe do BRA, bíonn comórtas ann don líon áiteanna ar phointí laghdaithe bunaithe ar thorthaí na hArdteistiméireachta
A reduced point place means that you may get a place on a third-level course with fewer than the full CAO points
Ciallaíonn áit le ‘pointí laghdaithe’ go bhfeadfá áit a fháil ar chúrsa tríú leibhéal gan na pointí iomlána don CAO a bhaint amach
For example, if you are eligible for HEAR and you get 350 Leaving Certificate points, you may be offered a place on a course that is 360 points through CAO
Mar shampla, má tá tú incháilithe do BRA agus má bhaineann tú 350 pointe amach san Ardteistiméireacht, d’fhéadfaí áit ar chúrsa 360 pointe a thairiscint duit tríd an CAO
However, you must meet the college matriculation and any specific course entry requirements
Mar sin féin, caithfear máithreánach an choláiste agus riachtanais iontrála ar leith an chúrsa a chomhlíonadh
If you get a place through HEAR you will also be offered a range of supports while you are studying at college, such as an orientation programme, extra tuition, study skills and mentoring
Má fhaightear áit tríd an scéim BRA, tairgfear raon tacaíochtaí duit freisin nuair atá tú ag staidéar sa choláiste cosúil le teagasc breise, scileanna staidéir agus meantóireacht
The supports available will vary from college to college
Cuirfear tacaíochtaí difriúla ar fáil sna coláistí éagsúla
To be eligible for HEAR you must meet certain indicators or criteria related to your financial, social and economic circumstances
Chun a bheith incháilithe don scéim BRA, caithfear táscairí nó critéir áirithe a chomhlíonadh i ndáil le cúinsí airgeadais, sóisialta agus eacnamaíochta
You must also be under 23 years of age on 1 January of the year the course starts
Ní mór duit a bheith faoi bhun 23 bliana d'aois an 1 Eanáir 2017 freisin
• Financial (for entry autumn 2017):
Airgeadas (ar iontráil i bhfómhar na bliana 2017):
Income: Your total family income (that is gross income before tax and PRSI are deducted) for the year 2015 was within the HEAR income limits (see table below)
Ioncam: Ioncam iomlán an teaghlaigh don bhliain 2015 (sin ollioncam sular asbhaintear cáin agus ÁSPC) atá laistigh de theorainneacha ioncaim an BRA (féach tábla thíos)
Medical card: You, your parent(s) or guardian(s) hold a medical card or GP visit card on 31 December 2016
Cárta leighis: Cárta Leighis nó Cárta Cuairte Dochtúra agat féin, do thuismitheoir nó caomhnóir an 31 Nollaig 2016
Social welfare: Your parent(s) or guardian(s) were getting a means-tested social assistance payment for at least 26 weeks in 2015
Leas sóisialach: Do thuismitheoirí nó caomhnóir ag fáil íocaíochta cúnaimh shóisialaigh atá tástáilte ó thaobh acmhainne ar feadh 26 seachtain leanúnach ar a laghad in 2015
Group: You come from a socio-economic group that is under-represented in higher education, for example: non-manual workers; semi-skilled and unskilled manual workers; agricultural workers
Grúpa: Tagann tú ó ghrúpa socheacnamaíochta ar beag ionadaíochta atá acu sa réimse ardoideachais, mar shampla: oibrithe neamhláimhe; oibrithe láimhe leathoilte nó neamhoilte; oibrithe feirmeoireachta
School: You have completed 5 years of second-level education at a school in the DEIS (Delivering Equality of Opportunity in Schools) programme
Scoil: 5 bliana d’oideachas dara leibhéal déanta agat ar scoil faoi DEIS (Comhionannas Deiseanna i Scoileanna a Sheachadadh)
Area: You are living in an area of concentrated disadvantage and social exclusion with, for example, high unemployment and poverty and few community facilities
Limistéar: Tá cónaí ort i gceantar uirbeach nó tuaithe atá faoi mhórán míbhuntáiste agus eisiaimh shóisialta, mar shampla, le dífhostaíocht ard agus bochtanas agus beagán áiseanna poiblí
HEAR income limits 2017
Limistéir ioncaim BRA 2017
│Number of dependent children* in your family │Family income in 2015 │
│Líon na bpáistí cleithiúnaigh* i do theaghlach │Ioncaim na clainne 2015 │
│Fewer than 4 │€45,790 │
│Níos lú ná 4 │€45,790 │
│More than 8 │€54,630 │
│Níos mó ná 8 │€54,630 │
│Add €4,670 to the total income for every sibling/parent enrolled in a full-time college, university or Post-Leaving Certificate further education course
│Cuir €4,670 leis an ioncam iomlán le haghaidh gach siblín/tuismitheoir atá cláraithe i gcúrsa lán-aimseartha in ollscoil nó i gcoláiste nó i gcúrsa Iar-Ardteistiméireachta

*A 'dependent child' is a child under age 16 on 1 October 2016 or a parent or child over 16 who is attending a full-time educational institution or is medically certified as permanently unfit for work

*Is é 'leanbh cleithiúnach' leanbh faoi aois 16 an 1 Deireadh Fómhair 2016 nó tuismitheoir nó leanbh os cionn 16 atá ag freastal institiúid oideachais lánaimseartha nó atá deimhnithe de réir míochaine neamhábalta lena oibre go buan
Fulfilling the indicator requirement
Riachtanas maidir leis an táscaire a chomhlíonadh
Of the 6 indicators above you must meet the low income indicator 1 and a combination of 2 other indicators
As na 6 tháscaire thuasluaite, caithfear an táscaire ísealioncaim a shásamh mar aon le meascán de 2 tháscaire eile
There are 4 different combinations as follows:
Tá ceithre mheascán éagsúla ann mar seo a leanas:
│A│Indicator 1 │Plus 2 │Plus 4 or 5 or 6 │
│A│Táscaire 1 │Móide 2 │Móide 4 nó 5 nó 6 │
│B│Indicator 1 │Plus 3 │Plus 4 or 5 or 6 │
│B│Táscaire 1 │Móide 3 │Móide 4 nó 5 nó 6 │
│C│Indicator 1 │Plus 4 │Plus 5 or 6 │
│C│Táscaire 1 │Móide 4 │Móide 5 nó 6 │
│D│Indicator 1 │Plus 5 plus 6 │ │
│D│Táscaire 1 │Móide 5 móide 6 │ │
As part of your application you must provide documentation to show that you meet the required indicators
Caithfear doiciméid a sholáthar mar chuid den iarratas a léiríonn gur chomhlíon tú na táscairí riachtanacha
Examples of the documentation required are:
Seo a leanas samplaí de dhoiciméid riachtanacha:
• P21 or Notice of Assessment from the Revenue Commissioners for 2015 (you can request this from Revenue)
• P21 nó Fógra Measúnaithe ó na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim i leith na bliana 2015 (is féidir iarratas ar p21 chuig Revenue a dhéanamh)
• Statement of welfare benefits received from the Department of Social Protection in 2015 (download this page from your online HEAR application form)
• Ráiteas de shochair leasa shóisialaigh atá faighte ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí sa bhliain 2015 (is féidir an leathanach seo a íoslódáil ó d'fhoirm BRA)
• Confirmation from your Local Health Office of a medical or GP visit card valid on 31 December 2016 (download this page from your online HEAR application form)
• Dearbhú maidir le Cárta Leighis nó Cárta Cuairte LG, atá bailí ar 31 Nollaig 2016, ón Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil a bhaineann leat (is féidir an leathanach seo a íoslódáil ó d'fhoirm BRA)
If you wish to apply for a college place under the HEAR scheme you should apply online through the CAO
Más mian leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar áit sa choláiste faoin scéim BRA, ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh ar líne tríd an LIO
The closing date for admission in autumn 2017 is 1 February 2017
Is é 1 Feabhra 2017 an dáta iontrála deiridh fómhar na bliana 2017
When you are filling in the online CAO form you must complete the part of the form to say you wish to apply for the HEAR scheme
Nuair atá an fhoirm LIO ar líne á líonadh isteach agat, caithfidh tú an chuid den fhoirm a chomhlánú a shonraíonn gur mian leat iarratas a dhéanamh ar an scéim BRA
You will then be directed to a separate HEAR application form
Ina dhiaidh sin, déanfar thú a threorú chuig foirm iarratais BRA ar leith
You must complete this part of your application by 1 March 2017
Caithfidh tú an pháirt seo na foirme roimh 1 Márta 2017 a chomhlánú
Then on the HEAR application form you must answer questions on your family’s income, your parents’ employment status and the schools you attended
Ansin ar an bhfoirm iarratais BRA caithfidh tú ceisteanna a fhreagairt maidir le hioncam do theaghlaigh, stádas fostaíochta do thuismitheoirí agus na scoileanna a raibh tú mar mhac léinn iontu
By 1 April 2017 your supporting documents must reach the CAO, providing evidence of your circumstances
Faoi 1 Aibreán 2017 ní mór do do cháipéisí tacaíochta an LIO a bhaint amach, ag soláthar fianaise de do chúinsí
No applications will be accepted after the closing dates
Ní ghlacfar le haon iarratais tar éis na spriocdhátaí
The closing dates are very strict because HEAR is an additional application procedure which needs extra processing time
Tá na dátaí deireanacha an-dian de bhrí go bhfuil nós imeachta iarratais breise ar BRA a bhfuil am próiseála breise ag teastáil uaidh
You will get a letter in late June 2017 (after the Leaving Certificate examination) telling you whether you are eligible for the scheme
Gheobhaidh tú litir i mí an Mheithimh dhéanaigh 2017 (tar éis scrúdú na hArdteistiméireachta) ag insint duit cibé an bhfuil tú incháilithe don scéim
If you are told you are not eligible you can ask for your application to be reviewed
Má dheirtear leat nach bhfuil tú incháilithe is féidir leat iarradh ar athbhreithniú
Your HEAR application does not affect your CAO application, which will be processed in the usual way after you get your Leaving Certificate results
Ní chuireann d’iarratas BRA isteach ar d'iarratas LIO, a phróiseálfar ar an ngnáthbhealach i ndiaidh duit do chuid torthaí Ardteistiméireachta a fháil
The CAO helpline at (091) 509 800 can assist school-leavers with their HEAR application
Is féidir le líne cabhrach an LIO ag (091) 509 800 cabhrú le lucht fágála scoile maidir lena n-iarratas BRA
You can find further information in this list of frequently asked questions on the Access College website
Is féidir tuilleadh eolais a fháil sa liosta ceisteanna coitianta seo ar láithreán gréasáin an Choláiste Rochtana
You can also contact the access services of the colleges participating in the HEAR scheme
Is féidir teagmháil a dhéanamh freisin le seirbhísí rochtana na gcoláistí atá rannpháirteach sa scéim BRA
The HEAR programme runs nationwide information sessions which aim to answer questions that students (or their parents/guardians) may have about preparing the application for HEAR

Cuireann an clár BRA seisiúin eolais ar fáil ar fud na tíre chun ceisteanna a d’fhéadfadh mic léinn (nó a dtuismitheoirí/a gcaomhnóirí) a bheith acu a fhreagairt maidir leis an iarratas a ullmhú do BRA
You can download application guide and workbooks to help with your application
Is féidir leat treoir iarratais mhionsonraithe a íoslódáil chun cabhrú le d'iarratas
You can also access information about HEAR on Facebook
Is féidir leat teacht ar eolas freisin faoi BRA ar Facebook
